name: Wonderful Chalet
shortDescription: Reconnect with nature in this unforgettable mountain chalet with wonderful views and access to the Capivari dam.

name: Sustainable Cabin
shortDescription: Located in the middle of the Atlantic forest at the top of a mountain, which provides an incredible experience with a view of a set of mountains.

name: Breathtaking View
shortDescription: The place has a breathtaking view of the entire beachfront of Balneário Camboriú.

name: Front of Paradise
shortDescription: This place has a strategic location: in front of the beaches of Maracaipe.
